name: BNB Smart Chain
description: We are building a metaverse universe that will bring the world of visual arts to the blockchain network. BlueArt; will organize exhibitions on Metaverse with famous names from the painting and animation world. We have implemented an ecosystem that will also create opportunities for new and promising artists to be recognized. Users on the BlueArt platform can buy and sell unique digital items such as artwork, game items and more in the form of Non Fungible Tokens (NFT). The platform offers users a fully featured marketplace that is filtered and sorted using different categories to create a smooth and easy user experience. BlueArt Token; It operates as a BEP20 token on Binance Smart Chain and has a maximum supply of 88 million units. It is technically impossible to increase the supply of BlueArt Token as this feature has been canceled in the smart contract. Maximum Supply; will decrease continuously with regular manual burning.
